value.title: How DeepMind boss Demis Hassabis used chess to get billionaire Peter Thiel to ‘take notice’ of his AI lab
value.excerpt: Demis Hassabis, the co-founder of AI lab DeepMind, has revealed that he talked about chess instead of his start-up idea when he first met Peter Thiel.

value.title: Meet Ghost Robotics, the Boston Dynamics of combat bots
value.excerpt: Ghost’s quadruped bots are the scary older brother of every other dog robot you’ve ever seen. And with good reason. They’re shipping off to join the military.

value.title: AWS Cloud Tech to Power MGM Media Supply Chain
value.excerpt: SEATTLE—Amazon Web Services has reached a multi-year deal with Metro Goldwyn Mayer (MGM) that will power MGM’s media supply chain with AWS cloud technology to help distribute its TV and film content across multiple platforms.

value.title: Juniper Networks acquires datacenter network automation startup Apstra
value.excerpt: Juniper Networks acquired Apstra, a startup specializing in datacenter network automation, for an undisclosed sum.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence Firm C3.ai Raises IPO Price Range
value.excerpt: The initial public offering market in 2020 remained hot Monday with enterprise artificial intelligence company C3.ai raising its pricing to between $36 and $38 per share. The Redwood City, California-based company previously had a debut range between $31 and $34 per share.

value.title: Artificial network model describes entire movement planning in the brain

value.title: Mohsen Fakhrizadeh: 'Machine-gun with AI' used to kill Iran scientist
value.excerpt: A satellite-controlled machine-gun with "artificial intelligence" was used to kill Iran's top nuclear scientist, a Revolutionary Guards commander says. Mohsen Fakhrizadeh was shot dead in a convoy outside Tehran on 27 November.

value.title: Love match: Tokyo to help fund Japanese AI cupid upgrades-report
value.excerpt: The Japanese government plans to step up efforts to stem the country's tumbling birth rate by helping to fund more sophisticated artificial intelligence matchmaking systems, media said on Monday.

value.title: Facial recognition toilet paper dispensers in China put on hold as privacy concerns grow

value.title: CSIRO's Data61 researchers develop AI helmet to prevent seizure disorders
value.excerpt: Researchers from the Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation's (CSIRO) Data61 have developed an implantable artificial intelligence monitoring and seizure detection helmet system designed to prevent seizure disorders for patients who have undergone decompressive brain surgery.

value.title: Elon Musk makes clear his stance on self-driving cars, AI oversight, and his 'ad for Mars'
